name: ServiceNow
description: Integrate with ServiceNow to list, create, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Incidents
tools.description: List incidents from ServiceNow. Optionally filter by state, priority, or assignment group.

tools.name: Create Incident
tools.description: Create a new incident in ServiceNow. Provide a short description and optional details.

tools.name: Update Incident
tools.description: Update an existing ServiceNow incident. Can change state, priority, assignment, or add work notes.

tools.name: List Changes
tools.description: List change requests from ServiceNow. Optionally filter by state, type, or risk.

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Search records across ServiceNow tables using encoded queries. Useful for finding records by keyword or advanced criteria.

instance.label: Instance Name
instance.description: Your ServiceNow instance name (e.g. "mycompany" for mycompany.service-now.com)
